title: Neena Gupta:60-Year-Old Neena Gupta Garners Praise From Fans After She Shares Pics Of Her Prosthetic Session
text:
60-Year-Old Neena Gupta Garners Praise From Fans After She Shares Pics Of Her Prosthetic Session

60-Year-Old Neena Gupta Garners Praise From Fans After She Shares Pics Of Her Prosthetic Session

Some actors do all it takes to get into the skin of their characters. And, sometimes it's in literal sense. These days, age is no bar as actors like Neena Gupta and Amitabh Bachchan are reinventing rules of acting in their own ways.

Recently, Actor Neena Gupta shared pictures from her prosthetics session for her upcoming film and everyone was floored with her determination. Considering the fact that prosthetics can be a mentally and physically taxing experience, everyone is praising Neena Gupta's patience.

Sharing the pictures on Instagram, Neena wrote, “An actress prepares!!”

Don't Miss 276 SHARES 192 SHARES 19.2 K SHARES 5 K SHARES

A lot of fans started pouring sweet messages for Neena, including her Badhaai Ho actor Gajraj Rao who reacted to the post, saying,

“Neena ji , your passion for the craft is so inspiring ... three cheers.”

Singer Harshdeep Kaur wrote, “Hats off to you!! Waiting for your next film.” Fans too couldn't stop themselves from praising her. A fan wrote, “Ufff prosthetic ! The toughest job ! Hats off. this is why i love you.” Another wrote, “Wow..dats called dedication.”

Neena Gupta stirred up a storm on social media after she reacted to the casting pattern of Saand Ki Aankh.

Starring Taapsee Pannu and Bhumi Pednekar, the film showcases their journey as a 60 year olds and that didn't go down with her. She wrote, "Yes I was just thinking about this hamari umar ke role toe kamsekam humse kara lo bhai. (Atleast cast us for the roles that suit our age..)
description: Recently, Actor Neena Gupta shared pictures from her prosthetics session for her upcoming film and everyone was floored with her determination. Considering the fact that prosthetics can be a mentally and physically taxing experience, everyone is praising Neena Gupta's patience.
